attributes.title: Terrible app!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to stay up to date with things and the next time I opened it the screen went black and then an orange demonic symbol popped up. The app then started rapidly flashing colors and violently vibrating until an ungodly amount of Cheetos started spilling from my device. It has pushed me and my family out of our home and it has ruined our lives. We lost our youngest to the mountain of Cheetos where our neighborhood used to be.
